metadata.synopsis: One-liner for refugees in the sewers, while getting shot at by Bhaal cultists.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Ensure you are in a deal with OrinLoad up CTY_Main_AGo to -20; 18; 789Click on |Refugee| - S_LOW_Refugee05 - c41b89e7-b720-4aeb-a266-89715c00e433

0.speaker: Refugee Pharbz
0.context: NodeContext: wincing in pain, clutching whatever is injured

1.speaker: Refugee Pharbz
1.text: Get back! The cultists - argh. They've shot half of us!
1.context: NodeContext: clutching somewhere (anywhere) as if he's been shot/injured. Scared and terrified as he's been shot at from the opposing of a sewer.
